meanings.definition: Ugs (noun): a type of footwear, typically made of sheepskin and wool
meanings.sent1: I wore my cozy ugs to keep my feet warm in the winter.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of ugs for the upcoming ski trip.
meanings.sent3: The little dog tried to chew on my ugs thinking they were a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her ugs were like fluffy clouds hugging her feet.
meanings.sent5: The ugs felt like walking on pillows all day long.

meanings.definition: Ugs (adjective): unpleasant or unattractive in appearance
meanings.sent1: The old, torn curtains gave the room an ugs look.
meanings.sent2: She found the abandoned house to be quite ugs.
meanings.sent3: The cake may have tasted good, but it looked ugs.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti made the once beautiful wall look ugs.
meanings.sent5: The muddy shoes left an ugs trail on the clean floor.
